New Records: Keshav Maharaj took three wickets, including two in the final over
Anrich Nortje and Kagiso Rabada each took two wickets
Heinrich Klaasen scored 46 runs for South Africa
Towhid Hridoy scored 37 runs for Bangladesh
Key Match Events: Mahmudullah was dismissed in a crucial moment
Final delivery led to South Africa's victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: T20 World Cup points table update
